topic.title: How to Factory Reset Escene Phones
topic.shortdesc: Before you start to provision Escene phones with , you need to reset Escene phones to factory default settings. Otherwise, Auto Provision may fail because of the previous configurations on the phone.

body.p: This guide takes Escene ES330 running firmware V4.5.0.2-11506 as an example.

ol.li:
Find the phone IP address.
Navigate to Menu View Status on the phone.

Log in the phone web interface with your username and password.
username: root
password: root
Go to Phone Maintenance Basic Default Settings , click Reset to Factory Settings.

Click Yes to reset the phone.
The screen prompts you to reboot the phone.

Click Reboot.
The screen prompts you whether to reboot the phone.

Click Yes to reboot the phone.
The phone will be reset successfully after startup.
Do not power off during phone startup.
